Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-64720 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.51-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-64720 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.51-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpng is earlier than 1.6.51-1, affected by CVE-2025-64720
